Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes municipalities to develop and implement a plan for local land value taxation
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to develop and implement a plan for local land value taxation based on classes of land; allows real estate to be classified as land or land exclusive of buildings and buildings on land.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing municipalities to develop and implement a plan for local land value taxation
